name: Skel
overview: Death and destruction is your aim - you are "SKEL", a superhuman skeleton man, half bones and half machine. Created by the Gods, you were given supreme power to guard the universe, but you chose the dark side and became evil, inflicting your destructive powers against those that created you. Harness all your powers, before your plasma-gun de-energizes - destroy the fleets of mortal crusaders sent to obliterate you.
